BNC User Reference Guide

<namespace>

namespace supplies the formal name of the namespace to which the elements documented by its children belong.
Declaration 
element namespace { attribute name { data.namespace }, tagUsage+ }
Attributes
(In addition to global attributes)
name the full formal name of the namespace concerned.
Status: Required
Datatype (1–1) data.namespace
Note

This element is not used in the current release of the BNC: all elements belong to the empty namespace.
Module header
